testcase.query: Q(disease?,patientInfo!,dna!) := DiseaseInfectedPatients(disease?,p!), PatientPersonalInfo(p?,patientInfo!), PatientDNA(p?,dna!){disease = "K"}[availability > 98, price per call < 0.2, total cost < 1]

S4(x?, y?) := A5(x?, y?)[availability > 98%, price per call = 0.1$, response time < 2s]

S7(x?, y?) := A6(x?, y?)[availability > 95%, price per call = 0.1$, response time < 1s]
S8(x?, y?) := A1(x?, y?)[availability > 95%, price per call = 0.1$]

S5(c?, d!) := sameTopic(c?, d!)[price per call = 0.1]

S(a?) := e1(a?,b!), e2(b?,c!)[location = close, price per call = 0.2]
